name: Goat For The Throat
description:
Instructions

This game is a 2 player goat/sheep fighter and the objective is to goat for the throat!

This game was made in 3 days at TOJAM: Don't Stop bELEVEN!

Web Version:

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/24553261/GFTT_Web/GFTT_WebBuild.html

Controls:

ESC to exit game

R+T Restarts the Game

XBOX Controller

Move/Duck - joystick

Jump - A

Punch - X (hold to charge)

Block - B

Headbutt - Y (used for breaking blocks)

Keyboard Controls

Player 1

Move/Duck/Jump - WASD

Punch - Z (hold to charge)

Block - X

Headbutt - C (used for breaking blocks)

Player 2

Move/Duck/Jump - IJKL

Punch - M (hold to charge)

Block - ,

Headbutt - . (used for breaking blocks)

Credits:

Group: Wicked Styx

Programming

-Alex Haley

Arts

-Steve McLean

-Brendan Muller
